title: SDR4/SDR8/SDR15 Microwave Communication Equipment
explain: The SDR4/SDR8/SDR15 series is medium/large-capacity, medium/short-distance, and line-of-sight (LOS) microwave communication equipment and used for trunk link establishment of regional communication network and the communication between fixed command post and the mobile command posts of all armed services. With flexible operation mode: Stationary or installed on off-road vehicle
features:
Features

  • Group channel transmission
  • ECCM
  • 1+1 hot standby
  • Encryption (optional)
  • Antenna automatic alignment (optional)
  • EOW and emergency EOW
  • BITE, failures can be located to main module
  • Network management (NM)
form:
Specifications
ItemsSDR4SDR8SDR15
Communication distance30 km（vehicular）, 50 km（fixed ）, （LOS）30 km（LOS）
Operation frequency4.4-5.0 GHz7.7-8.5 GHz14.5-15.3 GHz
Output power≥30 dBm≥27 dBm≥24 dBm
Rx Threshold level≤-83 dBm (E3, BER=1×10-6)≤-81 dBm(E3, BER=1×10-6)
Transmission capacityn×E1+LANn≤16
ECCMElectric-tuning RF filter（SDR4）, jam-triggered frequency change, LPI, FEC
Frequency steps1 MHz
Power control30 dB 3 dB/step
